name: FMV Comedy Bundle
summary: Wales Interactive is proud to offer the FMV Comedy Bundle featuring Who Pressed Mute on Uncle Marcus?, Five Dates in one bundle!

name: FMTC
summary: FMTC is a multiplayer online shooter (TPS+FPS), 2Tap gameplay category. Choose the right location to land, choose the right skills for you, search for weapons, ammo, armor, vehicles and other equipment. One shot helmet, one shot head, two shots can kill the enemy, every moment, it is life and death.

name: FM7X: Continental Odyssey
summary: Continental Odyssey, a full-fledged episode consisting of 7 single player levels, 2 of these are secret and 4 are multiplayer-only.

name: FMX Riders
summary: FMX Riders is an Arcade Freestyle Motocross Racer.

name: FMV Detective
summary: Wales Interactive is proud to offer their very best FMV Detective games! Featuring The Isle Tide Hotel, Who Pressed Mute on Uncle Marcus? and The Shapeshifting Detective all in one bundle!

name: FM4X
summary: FM4X is a four-part mod by Fernando MÃ¡rquez that was created for Duke Nukem 3D: Atomic Edition. Released over the course of 16 years from 2004-2020, each of the four installments replaces one of the episodes from the base game.

name: FMath
summary: In FMath game you are going to solve 250 mathematical problems, there are 5 blocks and 50 problems in each block.

name: FMV Horror Bundle
summary:
An online interpreter is tricked into reading an ancient book that summons a demon into her home. Night Book is an interactive psychological thriller with supernatural elements and branching storylines.

After the unexpected death of a close friend, Kristina returns to her hometown looking for answers, only to unearth a string of dark secrets. The truth turns out to be far more harrowing than she could have imagined. I Saw Black Clouds is an interactive psychological thriller with supernatural elements and branching storylines.

The Bunker is an award-winning interactive psychological horror movie. You are John, born underground the day the bombs fell, now alone and trying to survive. But when an alarm goes off, a catastrophic chain of events begins. Unlock the dark secrets of your past as you try to escape The Bunker.

name: FMV Murder Mystery Bundle
summary: Wales Interactive are proud to offer you The Shapeshifting Detective and The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker, all discounted in one bundle!

name: FM
summary: A mysterious radio announcer describes a recent murder-suicide as the unknown protagonist navigates through an ever-shifting environment.

name: FMV Soulslike
summary: Described as an unholy union of retro nostalgic FMV style atop a modern day soulslike design- a truly unforgettable adventure awaits.

name: FMV Action
summary: Wales Interactive are proud to offer you Bloodshore and Mia and the Dragon Princess all discounted in one bundle!
